hero.title: Caring for the memory of your loved ones
hero.description: Care of burial sites, flowers and cleanliness all year round.

faqOne.title: What is included in a standard cleaning?
faqOne.description: We clean the memorial stone from dirt, dust and moss, remove weeds around it, sweep the territory and install live or artificial flowers (your choice).

faqTwo.title: Do you provide a photo report?
faqTwo.description: Yes, after each service we send a photo or video report so you can be confident in the work done.

faqThree.title: How often can I order service?
faqThree.description: You can book a one-time visit or choose a package (monthly or yearly care).

faqFour.title: What additional services are available?
faqFour.description: We offer candle replacement, inscription restoration, tile repair, and monument polishing.

faqFive.title: Can I order care if I live in another country?
faqFive.description: Of course. Everything can be completed online, and you will receive confirmation and a photo report via email or WhatsApp.

faqSix.title: How much does the service cost?
faqSix.description: The price depends on the package: a one-time visit, monthly care, or an annual subscription. Detailed rates are listed on the website in the 'Packages' section.

faqSeven.title: How does payment work?
faqSeven.description: Payment can be made by bank card online, by bank transfer or in cash (if you order on site).

faqEight.title: Is it possible to order individual conditions?
faqEight.description: Yes, if you have special requests (for example, regular flowers on certain dates), we will create a personal care plan.
